title: Railworks TS2015 Virtual Railroads DB E10
description:
DB E10 F-train

The package for the first version of the electric Einheitslok the DB from the 50s 
contains six versions of the box Einheitslok E10, 1st class car

The E10 locomotives differ in equipment variations such as 
lights, running boards, ventilation grille, label and number. With this compilation of the vehicles can be a for the 50er / 60er compile typical annual F train. As usual for vehicles from the range Expertline awaiting the E10 with lots of features and requires the player a lot more than other vehicles in the simulation.

The contained mobile models in the series are characterized by E10 
from extensive features and therefore are not for beginners suitable in TS 
and not be moved without first an intensive look at the manual 
to have thrown !!

Important!  Make sure you use please the possibility for the manual vehicle 
download before you buy, so you get an overview of requirements and 
can provide functions of the locomotive.
